extendedInfo.description: Would you like to find the truth? Well, now you can find it with this lie detector polygraph test. This is a futuristic fingerprint scanner, which can scan the thumb and determine truth or lie.Lie detector polygraph is the only lie detector app which supports 7 inch and 10 inch Android tabs.INSTRUCTIONSHold your thumb on the scanner and make a statement.After the scan finishes, it will determine if itâs a truth or lie! FEATURESRealistic looking scanner and the animationsVibration feedback.Lie detector polygraph test is an ultimate prank, fun app for fool your friends. It looks like a real lie detector! With this app, you can trick your neighbors, impress girls in the club and many more!
